price: (1) The command of Allāh is coming,[690] so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
footnotes: [690]- Literally, "has come," indicating the certainty and nearness of the Last Hour.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: atā amru al-lahi falā tastaʿjilūhu sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
